titleStmt.title: The reign of Christ unto which, He hath had a right from everlasting; which God hath spoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets, since the world began, Acts 3.21.
titleStmt.author: E. P.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; imprint and pages cropped affecting text; tightly bound with print show-through affecting legibility.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
